title: Generic Dataset Schema for CZ Net Data Submission Portal v1.0.0
description: Metadata for a dataset object submitted to a repository that is not supported by the CZ Hub Data Submission Portal

name.title: Name or title
name.description: Descriptive name or title for the resource.

description.title: Description or abstract
description.description: A string containing a description/abstract for the resource.

keywords.title: Subject Keywords
keywords.description: A list of free text keywords related to the resource.

enum: CZNet

creators.title: Creators
creators.description: Creators of the resource in order of importance.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: Contributors to the resource in order of importance.

license.title: License
license.description: License under which the resource is released for access and reuse.

name.title: License Name
name.description: Name of the license under which the resource is released.

description.title: License Description
description.description: Text of the license or description of the license for the resource.

funders.title: Funding agency information
funders.description: Source of grants/awards that funded creation of all or part of the resource.

relations.title: Related resources
relations.description: Raw textual references (e.g., a bibligraphic citation) for publications and datasets related to this resource.

items.title: Related Resource Metadata
items.description: Metadata associated with a resource related to the resource being described.

type.title: Relation Type
type.description: The type of relationship that exists between the describe resource and a related resource.
enum: The content of this resource can be executed by
The content of this resource was created by a related App or software program
This resource is described by

This resource has another resource in another format
This resource is a different format of
This resource is required by
This resource requires
This resource is referenced by
The content of this resource references
The content of this resource is derived from

value.title: Value
value.description: String expressing the Full text citation, URL link for, or description of the related resource

notes.title: Additional notes
notes.description: Additional notes related to the resource.

version.title: Version
version.description: A version tag string for the resource - e.g., v1.0.0. Mostly relevant for software and dataset uploads. Any string will be accepted, but semantically-versioned tag is recommended.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: A globally unique and persistent identifier for the submission.

temporalCoverage.title: Temporal coverage
temporalCoverage.description: The temporal coverage of the resource. The time period that it describes or applies to.

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the time interval.

start.title: Start
start.description: A datetime object containing the instant corresponding to the commencement of the time interval (ISO8601 formatted date) - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.

end.title: End
end.description: A datetime object containing the instant corresponding to the termination of the time interval (ISO8601 formatted date) - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.

spatialCoverage.title: Spatial coverage
spatialCoverage.description: The place(s) that are the focus of the resource. The geospatial area that the resource describes, the spatial topic of a resource, the spatial applicability of a resource, or jurisdiction under with a resource is relevant.

anyOf.title: Point Coverage Metadata
anyOf.description: Geographic coverage metadata for a resource or aggregation expressed as a point location

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the place associated with the geographic coverage.

east.title: East
east.description: The coordinate of the point location measured in the east direction (between -180 and 180)

north.title: North
north.description: The coordinate of the point location measured in the north direction (between -90 and 90)

units.title: Units
units.description: The units applying to the unlabelled numeric values of north and east.

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: The name of the projection used with any parameters required, such as ellipsoid parameters, datum, standard parallels and meridians, zone, etc.

anyOf.title: Box Coverage Metadata
anyOf.description: Geographic coverage metadata for a resource expressed as a latitude-longitude bounding box.

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing a name for the place associated with the geographic coverage.

northlimit.title: North limit
northlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the northernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -90 and 90)

eastlimit.title: East limit
eastlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the easternmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -180 and 180)

southlimit.title: South limit
southlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the southernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -90 and 90)

westlimit.title: West limit
westlimit.description: A floating point value containing the constant coordinate for the westernmost face or edge of the bounding box (between -180 and 180)

units.title: Units
units.description: A string containing the units applying to the unlabelled numeric values of northlimit, eastlimit, southlimit, and westlimit.

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: A string containing the name of the projection used with any parameters required, such as ellipsoid parameters, datum, standard parallels and meridians, zone, etc.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: The repository or organization that provides access to the resource.

name.title: Provider Name
name.description: The name of the repository or organization that provides access to the resource.

dateCreated.title: Date created
dateCreated.description: The date on which the resource was originally created (ISO8601 formatted date) - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.

dateModified.title: Date modified
dateModified.description: The date on which the resource was last modified (ISO8601 formatted date) - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.

datePublished.title: Date published
datePublished.description: The date on which the resource was permanently published or first became available online. Where the full date is not available, provide the year.

status.title: Data collection is ongoing
status.description: Indicate whether data collection is ongoing for this dataset

Creator.title: Creator Metadata
Creator.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with a creator of a resource

name.title: Name
name.description: Full name of person or organization. Personal name format: family, given.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: A string containing the name of the organization with which the creator is affiliated

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the creator

errorMessage.pattern: must match the ORCID pattern. e.g. '0000-0001-2345-6789'

Contributor.title: Contributor Metadata
Contributor.description: A class used to represent the metadata associated with a contributor to a resource.

name.title: Name
name.description: Full name of person or organization. Personal name format: family, given.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: A string containing the name of the organization with which the contributor is affiliated.

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the contributor.

errorMessage.pattern: must match the ORCID pattern. e.g. '0000-0001-2345-6789'

Award.title: Funding award metadata
Award.description: Metadata associated with a funding award under which the resource was produced/created.

fundingAgency.title: Funding agency name
fundingAgency.description: Name of the agency or organization that funded the creation of the resource.

awardNumber.title: Award number or identifier
awardNumber.description: A unique numeric or string identifer for the grant or project.

awardName.title: Award name
awardName.description: The name or title of the grant or project.

awardURL.title: Award URL
awardURL.description: A string containing a URL pointing to a website describing the award or funding agency.

RelationType.title: Relation Type
RelationType.description: The type of relationship that exists between the describe resource and a related resource.
